We focus on engaging, inspiring, and supporting the tech community in the RTP area

We love our community

Devs@RTP is an inclusive group of local developers who enjoy supporting tech enthusiasts.

We host community led social gatherings, mentorship, professional readiness activities such as resume reviews & mock interviews.

Interested in volunteer opportunities? We sure could use your help.

Don’t hesitate to reach out on Slack!

Join Us On Slack

Devs@RTP Teens encourages young adults to collaborate and engage in coding activities.
We strongly support youth in learning coding and sharing knowledge.

Learn About Devs@RTP Teens

Attend one of our events to meet the group members and make new friends
